description: Who Translates and for Whom? Fourth part of the What is Translation Podcast series. In this part, the question of who is best placed to translate classic texts; academics, poets, dramatists and who is best placed to receive the translation, students, scholars or the general public 0:20:24 Oliver Taplin,

is_part_of.title: University of Oxford Podcasts: Faculty of Classics

title: Who Translates and for Whom?
